title: HOUR 3- Larry Scott and Michael Wilbon Sep 04, 2020
itunes:title: HOUR 3- Larry Scott and Michael Wilbon Sep 04, 2020
description:
Pac 12 Commissioner Larry Scott talks to Dan that testing has changed and become more rapid and that development could have the Pac 12 playing football in October but at least by January 2021. Michael Wilbon tells Dan that he was shocked that Steve Nash got the Head Coaching position for the Nets because he was not on anybodies radar.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

content:encoded:
Pac 12 Commissioner Larry Scott talks to Dan that testing has changed and become more rapid and that development could have the Pac 12 playing football in October but at least by January 2021. Michael Wilbon tells Dan that he was shocked that Steve Nash got the Head Coaching position for the Nets because he was not on anybodies radar.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
